DataElement.preferredName: Minimal Tumor Burden Three Or Greater Core Biopsy Prostate Criteria Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to signify whether or not the patient met the minimal tumor burden criteria of three or more cores positive for prostate cancer (of any magnitude of cancer burden) in the same prostate region.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Minimal Tumor Burden Three Or Greater Core Biopsy Prostate Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The smallest possible quantity._Refers to the number of cancer cells, the size of a tumor, or the amount of cancer in the body. Also called tumor load._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Notable in size, number, measure, magnitude, degree, or effectiveness._The removal of a tissue sample using a needle with a relatively large diameter, for microscopic examination._The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen._Criteria; a basis for comparison; a reference point against which other things can be evaluated.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The smallest possible quantity.:Refers to the number of cancer cells, the size of a tumor, or the amount of cancer in the body. Also called tumor load.

Concepts.definition: Refers to the number of cancer cells, the size of a tumor, or the amount of cancer in the body.

Property.preferredName: Three Or Greater Core Biopsy Prostate Gland Criterion
Property.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Notable in size, number, measure, magnitude, degree, or effectiveness.:The removal of a tissue sample using a needle with a relatively large diameter, for microscopic examination.:The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.:Criteria; a basis for comparison; a reference point against which other things can be evaluated.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Notable in size, number, measure, magnitude, degree, or effectiveness.
The removal of a tissue sample using a needle with a relatively large diameter, for microscopic examination.

The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.
That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.
